verbs.description: An Oregon high school [V: is] being sued for refusing to let a student wear a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt to class .
An Oregon high school is [V: being] sued for refusing to let a student wear a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt to class .
[ARG1: An Oregon high school] is being [V: sued] [ARG2: for refusing to let a student wear a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt to class] .
[ARG0: An Oregon high school] is being sued for [V: refusing] [ARG1: to let a student wear a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt to class] .
[ARG0: An Oregon high school] is being sued for refusing to [V: let] [ARG1: a student wear a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt to class] .
An Oregon high school is being sued for refusing to let [ARG0: a student] [V: wear] [ARG1: a pro - Trump border wall T - shirt] [ARG3: to class] .
